The photos were published on Facebook on: 2020, and have been shared more than 300 times.
The caption of the Facebook post: written in a mixture of Korean and Burmese, translates to English as describing a large fire at Ulsan tower in South Korea after a performance by the Myanmar boy band Project K.
A fire broke out at a 33: storey tower block in Ulsan, South Korea, on October 8, as reported by AFP on October 9.
